mission.title: Empowering the Next Generation of Tech Leaders
mission.subtitle: TechLabs is a non-profit organization dedicated to making technology education accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or financial situation.
mission.description: We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to learn in-demand tech skills and build a career in the digital economy. Through our innovative blended learning approach, we combine online resources with local community support to create a unique learning experience that prepares students for real-world success.

values.title: Accessibility
values.description: Free education for all, breaking down financial barriers to tech careers

values.title: Community
values.description: Local networks of learners, mentors, and industry professionals

values.title: Practicality
values.description: Real-world projects and skills that employers actually need

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Blended learning that combines the best of online and offline education

program.title: How Our Program Works
program.description: TechLabs offers a unique blended learning experience that combines the flexibility of online learning with the support of a local community.

phases.title: Application & Selection
phases.description: Apply online with your background and goals. We select candidates based on motivation and potential, not prior experience.

phases.title: Foundation Learning
phases.description: Build core skills through our online platform with support from mentors and peers.

phases.title: Project Development
phases.description: Work on real-world projects that build your portfolio and demonstrate your skills.

phases.title: Career Launch
phases.description: Get support with job applications, networking, and career planning.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Our team combines expertise in education, technology, and community building to create the best possible learning experience.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
members.bio: Former Google engineer with 15+ years in tech education and community development.

members.name: Marcus Weber
members.bio: Curriculum designer with expertise in adult education and skill development.

members.name: Lisa Müller
members.bio: Passionate about building inclusive communities and connecting people through technology.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about our program or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you.
